Question: Lymow Technology CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Lymow Technology

Product: Lymow One Robotic Mower

- Patented LyCut trimmer system with 21-inch cutting width and adjustable height
- Robust tracked treads for navigating diverse terrain, with 100% slope incline capability
- LySee multi-fusion navigation system for precise positioning and obstacle avoidance
- Ultrasonic radars, bumper sensors, and patented blade fender for safety
- User-friendly app for multi-zone and no-go zone management
- Real-time tracking, mowing schedule, and work log
- Auto-recharge and resume at interrupted point
- Rain detection for automatic return to the base
- Launching on Kickstarter in late Q1 2024, emphasizing functionality, usability, and durability
Summary_cn:
Lymow科技

产品：Lymow One智能割草机

- 采用专利的LyCut修剪系统，具备21英寸的割草宽度和可调节的高度
- 强大的履带履带，适应多样的地形，具备100%斜坡攀爬能力
- LySee多重融合导航系统，实现精准定位和避开障碍物
- 超声波雷达、防撞传感器和专利刀叶护罩，确保安全
- 用户友好的应用程序，支持多区域和禁入区域管理
- 实时追踪、修剪计划和工作记录
- 断点自动充电和恢复工作
- 雨水检测功能，自动回到基地
- 将于2024年第一季度末在Kickstarter上推出，强调功能性、易用性和耐用性
